faq.question: Is SummarizePDF validated for pharma use?
faq.answer: We're 21 CFR Part 11 compliant with audit trails and electronic records. Many pharma companies use us for competitive intelligence and literature review. For GxP systems, we offer validation support packages.

faq.question: Can it handle clinical study reports (CSRs)?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our AI is trained on clinical trial language and understands study design, endpoints, efficacy, and safety data. Perfect for CSR analysis.

faq.question: How does it help with pharmacovigilance?
faq.answer: The AI automatically highlights adverse events, drug interactions, and safety signals from clinical reports and literature. Your safety team can triage signals faster.

faq.question: What plan is best for pharma companies?
faq.answer: Medical affairs teams typically use the Pro plan ($19/mo). Clinical development and regulatory teams need our Team plan ($49/mo). Enterprise pharma needs custom plans with validation support. Contact sales.

faq.question: Can we use this for FDA submissions?
faq.answer: Yes! Export summaries with citations and page references for regulatory documents. We provide audit trails and validation documentation for Part 11 compliance.

faq.question: Is clinical trial data secure?
faq.answer: Very secure! SOC 2 certified with AES-256 encryption, access controls, and audit logs. Your clinical data is never shared or used for AI training.
